name: YouChooseEpicHistory
0:
”Alexa, open Epic History”
”Alexa, play Epic History”
”Alexa, open Epic History and go to the Stories Menu”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: epic history
Developer Terms of Use
des: YOU CHOOSE: EPIC HISTORY is a You Choose bundle from Capstone, powered by Earplay. This bundle features five action-packed, interactive stories, including Ancient China, Ancient Egypt, Colonial America, The Aztec Empire, and The Middle Ages. With simple voice commands, you’ll delve into fascinating time periods, explore different places in history, and learn from different perspectives. With multiple endings, this You Choose bundle is a truly dynamic experience.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
